citeinfo.origin: United States Geological Survey, Western Research Ecological Center, Las Vegas Field Station.

descript.purpose: Boundary file used to display habitat suitability models for several targeted species in the Gold Butte area of Clark County, Nevada conducted on behalf of the Bureau of Land Management, by the United States Geological Survey, Western Research Ecological Center, Las Vegas Field Station for the project Gold Butte Wildlife and Plant Habitat Modeling.

timeperd.current: Time period for which the data is relevant:

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.
theme.themekey: REQUIRED: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.

idinfo.useconst: Although these data were produced on a United States Geological Survey computer system, no liability is assumed or implied as to the current accuracy or utility of the data on any system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty for individual or aggregate use with other data. The United States Geological Survey shall not be held liable for the improper use of the data described and/or contained herein. By using this data you hereby agree to these conditions.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.
